title: New: Lostboycrow – HiyHiy
body:
**Lostboycrow** exploded onto the scene at the tail end of last year with his uplifting debut, [_Adolescent_](www.

crackintheroad.com/music/30462-new-lostboycrow-adolescent), and less than a month later is offering up his second track, _HiyHiy_. Another colourful slice of R&B inspired pop, it’s part Passion Pit, part Foster the People, and one hundred percent brilliant. Check it out below.

excerpt.full: Lostboycrow exploded onto the scene at the tail end of last year with his uplifting debut, Adolescent, and less than a month later is offering up his second track, HiyHiy. Another colourful slice of R&B inspired pop, it’s part Passion Pit, part Foster the People, and one hundred percent brilliant. Check it out below.
